Posts.Content: Hi Rosie I feel the same, I am due to start Letrozole next month, and whilst I have been given so many pro's, I am not happy about the cons. I know I need to speak to my Oncologist again.  I'm just glad to know I'm not alone.
Posts.Title: stopping letrozol

Posts.Content: I had my first ZA with my last chemo, last Wednesday. I've felt a little more unwell and in pain since last Friday.  I'm sure it'll all be fine a day or two. Maybe I've just been unlucky.
Posts.Title: Bones
